name: pnp-list-formatting-multi-line-view
title: Multi-line View
shortDescription: This sample demonstrates showing fields on separate rows, conditionally showing a button based on the current user, and how to use the defaultClick rowaction.
longDescription: This sample demonstrates showing fields on separate rows, conditionally showing a button based on the current user, and how to use the defaultClick rowaction.

references.name: Use view formatting to customize SharePoint
references.description: You can use view formatting to customize how items in SharePoint lists and libraries are displayed. To do this, you construct a JSON object that describes the elements that are displayed when an item is loaded in a view and any styles to be applied to those elements.
